definition: relating to court practice and procedure as opposed to the principles of law, the word class that qualifies nouns
details:
adjective
- relating to court practice and procedure as opposed to the principles of law
= example: relating to court practice and procedure as opposed to the principles of law
= synonyms: procedural
- of or relating to or functioning as an adjective
= synonyms: adjectival
noun
- the word class that qualifies nouns
- a word that expresses an attribute of something
